New Records: Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 7 runs, the best bowling figures in the match
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock was dismissed for 20 runs, c & b Hasaranga
Reeza Hendricks was dismissed for 4 runs, c PHKD Mendis b Thushara
Aiden Markram was dismissed for 12 runs, c PHKD Mendis b Shanaka
Tristan Stubbs was dismissed for 13 runs, c Asalanka b Hasaranga
Charith Asalanka was dismissed for 6 runs, c Hendricks b Nortje
Angelo Mathews was dismissed for 16 runs, c Baartman b Nortje
Dasun Shanaka was dismissed for 9 runs, b Rabada
Matheesha Pathirana was dismissed for 0 runs, c Markram b Rabada
Nuwan Thushara was dismissed for 0 runs, run out (Nortje/Jansen)
Post-Match Reflections: Anrich Nortje was awarded the Player of the Match award for his 4/7 bowling performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa won the match by 6 wickets, with 22 balls remaining
Sri Lanka's score of 77/10 was their lowest total in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 so far
Others: The match was played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York
The match was a part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024, Group D
